formElement.label: Additional Attributes:
formElement.documentation: Pass-through attributes for the container definition in JSON format. Supports container attributes defined in http://kubernetes.io/docs/api-reference/v1/definitions/#_v1_container.

formElement.label: HTTP Liveness Check path IP:
formElement.documentation: HTTP path to check health of container

formElement.label: HTTP Liveness Check Port (Port number or name of port for this container):
formElement.documentation: Port to check health of container

formElement.label: HTTP Liveness Intial Delay (Default to 5s):
formElement.documentation: Initial delay before checking the liveness of container

formElement.label: HTTP Liveness Period (Default to 5s):
formElement.documentation: Interval at which liveness of container should be checked after initial delay

formElement.label: Readiness command for container:
formElement.documentation: Command used to check if container is ready to serve traffic

formElement.label: Readiness Intial Delay (Default to 5s):
formElement.documentation: Initial delay before checking the Readiness of container

formElement.label: Readiness Period (Default to 5s):
formElement.documentation: Interval at which Readiness of container should be checked after initial delay
